title: Bunga our haven
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Housing, Co-operative
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Housing, Co-operative
Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Environment - Social aspects
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Environment - Social aspects
Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Environmental protection - Citizen participation
description: Pam Enting and some 19 other families are part owners of what they call 'Bunga Haven'. She tells the story of how this arrangement came to be, and of the environmental battles that were undertaken to save the lake.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Compilation title; B2002285; Digital Storytelling workshop : general public (September 2008); Active; 2008
